Paul seriously.
See,  for  example,  St.  Augustine,  The  Gift  of  Perseverance§  15  (citing  Ephesians  1:4–11),  §  34
(citing Philippians 2:12–13), § 47 (citing Romans 11:1–7), and St. Thomas Aquinas, Summa the-
ologiae, Part I, Qu. 23, (citing Romans 8:28–30).
